data.comment: The match is underway at Allianz Parque.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 2, Fluminense drive forward but Felippe Cardoso is judged offside.
Free kick Fluminense.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 4, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 8, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Fluminense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 11, Dodi of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In Sao Paulo, Patrick de Paula of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 12, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Emerson Santos (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Palmeiras push forward at Allianz Parque and Lucas Lima gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
In the minute 14, Willian for Palmeiras is whistled offside.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 18, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Hudson of Fluminense is pulled up for offside.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fluminense's Michel Araujo breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 29, Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fluminense's Danilo Barcelos gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Parque. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Palmeiras.
Fluminense pushes forward through Felippe Cardoso, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 34, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 35, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Wellington Silva, who is grimacing with pain.
Fluminenseâ€™s Wellington Silva is on his feet again at Allianz Parque.
Felippe Cardoso gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fluminense.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Fluminense's area.
In the minute 42, In Sao Paulo Palmeiras drive forward through Willian. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Palmeiras's Lucas Lima gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fluminense defender.
Palmeiras's Ze Rafael has been booked in Sao Paulo and will miss the next match through suspension.
In the minute 43, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 45, 7 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 45, Free kick Palmeiras.
Fluminense are coming forward and Nene gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Fluminense's Nene misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo Palmeiras attack through Raphael Veiga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Gustavo Scarpa for Palmeiras drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 45, Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Sao Paulo.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Allianz Parque.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Allianz Parque.
Important block from the Fluminense defence as Lucas Lima fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
In the minute 50, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Palmeiras.
At Allianz Parque, Wellington Silva has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Raphael Veiga smashes in a penalty at Allianz Parque. The score is now 1-0.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 53, Michel Araujo (Fluminense) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Fluminense are pushing forward but Igor Juliao's finish is wide of the goal.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 56, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Nene for Fluminense gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 57, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras's Willian is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, Palmeiras's Willian has run offside.
Palmeiras drives forward and Willian gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's now 2-0 in Sao Paulo as Raphael Veiga scores for Palmeiras.
In the minute 62, Luiz Henrique is replacing Wellington Silva for the away team.
Luiz Henrique (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 64, Felippe Cardoso of Fluminense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Felippe Cardoso for the away team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Fluminense are pushing forward but Luiz Henrique's finish is wide of the goal.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Lucas Lima of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 70, Odair Hellmann is making the team's second substitution at Allianz Parque with Marcos Paulo replacing Michel Araujo.
Fluminense make their third substitution with Caio Paulista replacing Nene.
Fluminense's Felippe Cardoso is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Felippe Cardoso (Fluminense) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Palmeiras defenders.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 73, Fluminense push forward at Allianz Parque and Igor Juliao gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 75, In Sao Paulo Fluminense drive forward through Caio Paulista. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Willian with Breno.
Ramires is replacing Ze Rafael for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Can Fluminense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a fourth substitution, with Lucca replacing Felippe Cardoso.
The home team have replaced Lucas Lima with Mayke. This is the third substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In the minute 84, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Fluminense at Allianz Parque.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Fluminense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 89, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
At Allianz Parque the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Fluminense are in shooting range from this free kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Breno for Palmeiras is whistled offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-0.
